author: gpetruc
body:
Small fixes to allow running muon tag & probe in 92X
 * remove references to `AssociationVector` of `bool` from the `ValueMap` converter: it's not needed, and throws in 92X due to missing dictionary.
 * tell `PATTriggerProducer` to not depend on the `TriggerResults` of its own process (fixes errors when running in scheduled mode)

tested with 10024.0, 136.731, 1330.0

@HuguesBrun
title: PhysicsTools fixes for Muon Tag & Probe in 92X
